title: Temporarily Suspend Service
description: A customer is traveling for three months and wants to suspend their line to avoid charges.

tasks.description: Identify the customer and explain the terms of a temporary suspension (e.g., reduced fee, duration limits).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly explains the vacation suspension policy.

tasks.description: Process the suspension request for the specified start and end dates.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully applies the suspension to the account for the correct date range.

tasks.description: Confirm the suspension details and the automatic reactivation date with the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a clear summary of the action taken.
